Articles.Content:
Hello fellow space travelers. I've looked all over and I can't seem to find it anywhere, so I'm turning to you all. Is there a way to have multiple command modules on one rocket? I've seen it on a few youtube videos and I'm at a lost of how to do it. Any help?

Thanks again!

Rocketeer
Hi Rocketeer88, this is only possible with add-ons currently, if you take a look at the Orda pack, you'll find some new pods in there
